title: Facial Hair Remover Stick Epilator Threading Beauty Tool
description: Every woman has undesired peach fuzz on her face, and every woman has gone through the pain and discomfort of tweezing, waxing or using harsh chemicals to remove that peach fuzz.This Threading Beauty Tool is designed to easily removes unwanted hair without harming your skin.  In just 2 minutes your unwanted facial hair will be gone!! Different from common depilatory device , this epilator could pull up  your fine hair by root. So you don't have to worry about the hair would send forth again in only few days.Using our epilator you can keep your skin smooth without the annoying fine hair for a long time. You can get rid of the removed fine hair growing thicker and tougher in few days. Given its excellent effect and convenience, this style of epilator is recommended by many female stars. With it ,you can remove your tiny fine hair thoroughly and quickly without pain.A natural, safe and convenient method to remove unwanted facial hair this Threading Beauty Tool works like tweezers except that it removes small areas of hair instead of one or two hairs at a time. No chemicals or creams are needed.

title: Real Techniques Fine Liner Brush
description: Designed with pro makeup artist Samantha Chapman, Real Techniques brushes combine high-tech materials with innovative design to make creating a pixel-perfect look easier than ever: Taklon bristles are ultra plush and smoother than the hair you'll find in other brushes. Since taklon is synthetic, it's 100% cruelty-free. The soft fibers help create a flawless, high-definition finish in any type of light, from sunlight to harsh indoor lighting. The color-coded system corresponds to the key steps of makeup application so you can create a flawless base (copper), enhanced eyes (purple), and the perfect finish like a pro (pink). Each brush head is hand-cut to the perfect shape, allowing for precise application from dense coverage to a soft, delicate finish. The collection is suitable for a wide range of products and every makeup need – from powders, creams, and liquids to mineral makeup, highlighter, and shimmer. Brush names on the handles make for easy reference when creating your favorite look.

title: DIY Homemade Mask Bowl Spoons Brush Appliances Set Pink
description: The mask bowl of DIY 4 In 1 Homemade Outfit is made of plastic, soft touch feel, easy to operate, the moderate size. Does not fear falls, does not fear the high temperature, does not fear the distortion.The mask stick has nice hand feeling. Using to whisk, to spread wipe the face mask.The mask brush has soft brushes head, the touch is comfortable, wooden handle and the aluminum tube, does not injury the skin the load bearing facial mask paste to the face use.The 3 different size gauges of homemade face mask outfit have 2.5ml, 5ml, 15ml, you can accord to your need in proper amount by the gauges.
